origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.get_loan_options', 'description': 'This function provides available loan options for purchasing a used car based on the credit score and desired loan amount.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'creditScore', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The credit score of the applicant.'}, {'name': 'loanAmount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The amount of loan desired for the purchase of a used car.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'loanOptions', 'description': 'The list of available loan options based on the provided credit score and loan amount.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.get_loan_options, 它的参数输入如下: 'creditScore'是'720', 'loanAmount'是'15000'.
